attributes.description:
This beautiful 2017 Fortuner has a full-service history with Toyota. It has fitted extras such as a tow bar, side steps, mags, leather seats, a USB and aux input and Bluetooth. 

MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient.

attributes.title: 2016 Hyundai Accent 1.6 Glide Auto

attributes.description:
2019 BMW M5 Competition with only 42000km's,

The sixth- generation BMW M5 super saloon returns with a mighty 460kw/750NM Twin-turbo, 4.4 litre V8 and a magnificent poise and balance that sets the standard in its class. Not only is the M5 faster '' its also better to drive and is more luxurious, but most importantly, it is imbued with a proper M-Car feel and timbre that rediscovers BMW's Big-car Mojo.

Extras:
- M Sport exhaust system
- Carbon Fibre roof 
- Automatic tailgate operation 
- BMW gesture control 
- Multifunction steering wheel 
- M1 & M2 Mode select 
- Driving and lane keep assist 
- Park assist front and rear cameras
- 20'' Michelin Pilot sport 4s wheels 
- Blue M brake callipers 
- Digital analogue dials 
- Android and apple car play
- Bowers and Wilkins sound system
and many more.

Only at carbon black auto KZN
